text: They thought that the bullet would silence us, but they failed
I am here to say, our house is on fire
We cannot all succeed, when half of us are held back
Humanity is no standing at a crossroads, we must now decide which path we want to take
But there is so much love out there, that is helping me to forget about all the pain that I am going through
Yes, it is a lot. It is a lot for a teenager
